Title: The Puppet Show
Plot: The new principal forces Giles to run Sunnydale High's annual talent show and Buffy, Willow and Xander have to perform against their will. Things get worse as the talent show proves to be a deadly place when one of the participants is found with her heart removed and the clues all point to one boy and his ventriloquist puppet.
GuestStars: Michelle Miracle, Krissy Carlson, Natasha Pearce, Chasen Hampton, Lenora May, Richard Werner, Burke Roberts, Tom Wyner, Kristine Sutherland, Armin Shimerman
